message_1: What is the bond energy of nitrogen gas in kilojoules per mole (kJ/mol) given that the N-N bond dissociation energy is 945 kJ/mol?
message_2: The bond energy of nitrogen gas (N2) is the same as the N-N bond dissociation energy, which is given as 945 kJ/mol. Therefore, the bond energy of nitrogen gas is 945 kJ/mol.
